page.title: 08LIFE STYLES
page.content: Public houses play an important part in the lifestyles of the over 18's of the 1980's.As well as drinking alcohol people visit them to meet friends and business acquaintances, sometimes to listen to live music and increasingly to eat meals.Family rooms and gardens enable children to accompany adults. For teenagers particularly, fashion styles which vary in shape and colour each year, discos for modern dancing and the pop culture are an important way of life and topic of conversation A national chart shows the most popular records each week.Celebration meals are enjoyed in restaurants or as dinner parties at home, mostly eaten in the evening. Some people gamble by forecasting the results of horse races or football matches and in this way money is wagered in a game of chance.
